verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: Donald Trump and Iran] [V: exchanged] [ARG1: sharp words] [ARGM-CAU: over oil prices] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] , [ARGM-ADV: with Tehran accusing the U.S. president of contributing to volatile prices after he withdraw from a global nuclear arms deal last] month.</p >

< p > Donald Trump and Iran exchanged sharp words over oil prices on Wednesday , with [ARG0: Tehran] [V: accusing] [ARG1: the U.S. president] [ARG2: of contributing to volatile prices] [ARGM-TMP: after he withdraw from a global nuclear arms deal last] month.</p >

< p > Donald Trump and Iran exchanged sharp words over oil prices on Wednesday , with Tehran accusing [ARG0: the U.S. president] of [V: contributing] [ARG2: to volatile prices] after he withdraw from a global nuclear arms deal last month.</p >

< p > Donald Trump and Iran exchanged sharp words over oil prices on Wednesday , with Tehran accusing the U.S. president of contributing to volatile prices after [ARG0: he] [V: withdraw] [ARG2: from a global nuclear arms deal] last month.</p >
